addnearmiss

PURPOSE

Add GRAPH to NEARMGRAPHS -- the list of "near miss graphs"

SYNOPSIS

function [nearmscores nearmgraphs] = addnearmiss(nearmscores, nearmgraphs,graph, score, currgraph, currscore, epsilon)

DESCRIPTION 

 Add GRAPH to NEARMGRAPHS -- the list of "near miss graphs"

0010 lsize = length(nearmscores); newind = 1:lsize;
0011 lower = find(nearmscores < score); l = lower(1);
0012 newind = setdiff(1:lsize,l);
